00044 #include <stdio.h>
00045 
00046 typedef std::map<std::string, int> ZipContentsMap;              // maps path to a zip content id
00047 
00048 class CZipFile
00049 {
00050   public:
00051     CZipFile() { m_nEntries=0; m_pFile=NULL; m_pDirData=NULL; }
00052     virtual ~CZipFile() { End(); fclose(m_pFile); }
00053 
00054     bool Init(const _TCHAR *resFileName);
00055     void End();
00056 
00057     int GetNumFiles()const { return m_nEntries; }
00058     void GetFilename(int i, char *pszDest) const;
00059     int GetFileLen(int i) const;
00060     bool ReadFile(int i, void *pBuf);
00061         optional<int> Find(const char *path) const;
00062 
00063         ZipContentsMap m_ZipContentsMap;
00064 
00065   private:
00066     struct TZipDirHeader;
00067     struct TZipDirFileHeader;
00068     struct TZipLocalHeader;
00069 
00070     FILE *m_pFile;              // Zip file
00071     char *m_pDirData;   // Raw data buffer.
00072     int  m_nEntries;    // Number of entries.
00073 
00074     // Pointers to the dir entries in pDirData.
00075     const TZipDirFileHeader **m_papDir;   
00076 };
